law_text: A speed in excess of the limits specified... is prima facie evidence that the speed is not reasonable and prudent.
preventive_tip: Speed limits are 'prima facie'—you can be ticketed for unsafe speed even below the limit.
rule_summary: Exceeding posted limits is evidence of unreasonable speed.

law_text: A person may not operate a motor vehicle in this state unless financial responsibility is established for that vehicle.
preventive_tip: Keep a digital or paper copy of current insurance in the car at all times.
rule_summary: Driving without valid liability insurance is prohibited.

violation: Use of Wireless Device in School Crossing Zone
law_text: An operator may not use a wireless communication device while operating a motor vehicle within a school crossing zone...
preventive_tip: Put the phone down completely when you see flashing school zone lights.
rule_summary: Strict ban on all wireless device use in active school zones.
